message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal for a product worth more than $12,000 to me. Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $10,800 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite there yet.  I'm willing to come down a little to $11,200.  It's a fair price for both of us. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I understand that you're willing to come down, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $10,900 for the product. Can you consider this offer?
